lead_paragraph: Lindsay Davenport got off to a good start in her first tuneup event for the Australian Open, beating Laura Granville, 6-2, 6-3, on Monday in the first round of the ASB Women’s Classic in Auckland, New Zealand. Davenport, 31, won in 66 minutes. The Australian Open will be her first Grand Slam event in more than a year.
